Articles.Content:
I made a probe to escape the suns gravity and in the process accidentally got a Jool encounter.

has anyone else done something on accident like this.
Brilliant! How long did it/will it take to get there?
I dont remember exactly but it ended up being 10 mins. at full time warp.
I just remembered something else. I don't have any pictures, but twice I have accidentally landed at a mun arch
nice! you still can escape Sun's gravity, by using Jool to perform a slingshot maneuver.
Hmm, my calculations come to almost 700 days. That doesn't seem right.

The first week I played, I wanted that time a probe in a orbit. It went a littlebit overpowered, so I've got my first moon orbit!

EDIT: Oh, and I accidently found the moon arch, and now I have a base there
I accidentally overshot Minimus when I was trying to get a rover there, and I went to Duna instead. My rover wasn't tested for atmospheres properly so it crashed though.
